text: This is a partial list of the chairmen of Royal Dutch Shell: * Mark Moody- Stuart, 1998 to 2001 * Sir Philip Watts, 2001 to 2004 * Aad Jacobs, 2004 to 2006 * Jorma Ollila, 2006 to 2015 * Charles O. Holliday, May 2015 to present The situation was originally more complicated: ==Chairman of the Committee of Managing Directors of Royal Dutch Shell== * Sir Peter Holmes, 1985 to 1993 * Cor Herkströter, 1993 to 1998 * Mark Moody-Stuart, 1998 to 2001 ==Chairman of Shell Transport and Trading== * Sir Peter Holmes, 1985 to 1993 * John Jennings, 1993 to 1997 * Mark Moody-Stuart, 1997 to 2001 ==References== Category:Directors of Royal Dutch Shell Shell Category:Royal Dutch Shell
title: List of chairmen of Shell
